name: Final Fantasy XI: Wings of the Goddess
name_original: Final Fantasy XI: Wings of the Goddess
description:
Final Fantasy XI: Wings of the Goddess is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2007. Square Enix published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Final Fantasy XI: Wings of the Goddess on PC.
Akihiko Matsui and Hiromichi Tanaka produced the game. It was directed by Akihiko Matsui, Koichi Ishii, Koichi Ogawa and Mizuki Ito. It was scored by Kumi Tanioka, Naoshi Mizuta and Nobuo Uematsu.
